archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: HNGA Counter Based Application [CBA]
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
Horizon Next Generation (HNG) Anywhere Counter Business Application.
The version of the Horizon POS software that can run on "any" terminal, i.e. not on a Fujitsu POS build that is specific to Horizon but a generic Windows terminal that can run a JVM.
Note: R13.05 of HNG is a single code source; when on NT4 it is HNGX, when on Windows 8 and Java 8 it is HNGA
